entities.name: veritas
entities.description: Veritas is mentioned as a person who has been betrayed by the Dark Lord.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a title given to a powerful wizard who has many followers and enemies.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as someone who ran away and did not put Harry's name in the goblet.

relationships.description: The Dark Lord has ways of tracking his enemies, implying that Veritas is an enemy of the Dark Lord.
Karkaroff did not put Harry's name in the goblet.
